articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: ‘Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 3’ Was A 16 Month Rush Job, Surprising No One - Forbes
articles.description: At this point it’s becoming established that Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3’s campaign may be the worst in series history, with the entire game feeling like a tacked-on addition to last year’s Modern Warfare 2.
